meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, City Hall Council Chambers and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Discussion and approval of a resolution
agenda_items.description: approving the transaction for The Cedars located at 2000 & 2220 S. Ervay St, Dallas, TX; including the execution of all documentation necessary to carry out the transactions; authorizing the purchase of the land for the projects and authorizing the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to serve as the general contractor; and other matters in connection therewith
agenda_items.presenter: Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Discussion regarding the Demolition of the facility
agenda_items.presenter: Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jake Brown, LDG
